description: AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 29 2024 at 2pm EDT. All bids submitted after will be declared non-responsive. R.064594.326 Boiler Rental Hangar 11 190 Clear Skies Private, Ottawa, ON,K1V 1E5 This procurement contains a mandatory security requirement. At bid closing, the Bidder must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS). Failure to comply with this requirement will render the Bid non-compliant. There will be a site visit on May 15 at 10:00am. Interested Bidders are to meet at the front of the building at 190 Clear Skies Private, Ottawa, ON. Free parking is available on site. No safety equipment nor entrance to the building is required. The names of each individual attending the site visit, along with the name of the firm they represent, must be provided to the Contracting Authority by May 13 at 9am in order to gain access to the site. For more information please contact using the provided contact information
tags: Services de construction et d'entretien de bâtiments
full_summary:
# Boiler Rental Hangar 11 Tender

### Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals for the rental of a boiler for Hangar 11. This procurement is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Tender Details

* **Reference:** WS4277768456-Doc4552347781
* **Amendment:** 6
* **Tender Number:** WS4277768456
* **Publication Date:** May 2, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 29, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date:** May 27, 2024

### Description of Requirements

The procurement is for the rental of a boiler for Hangar 11. A mandatory security requirement applies to this procurement. Bidders must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) at the time of bid closing. Failure to comply with this requirement will render the bid non-compliant.

### Site Visit

A site visit is scheduled for May 15, 2024, at 10:00 AM. Interested bidders are to meet at the front of the building at 190 Clear Skies Private, Ottawa, ON. Parking is available on-site. The names of individuals attending the site visit and their affiliated organizations must be provided to the Contracting Authority by May 13, 2024, at 9:00 AM.

### Lot Description

* **UNSpsc:** 40102000, 72000000, 72151000
* **BSIN:** Not Applicable
* **Product/Service:** Rental of a boiler

### Bid Submission

Along with this tender, bidders are required to submit all supporting documentation required for this procurement. Bid submissions must be made by May 29, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST. Failure to comply with this requirement will render the bid non-compliant.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is covered under the following trade agreements:

* **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**

### Contact Information

Inquiries related to this tender should be addressed to:

Gillian Fenwick, 
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 
gillian.fenwick2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### URL

The tender notice can be accessed on the following URL:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19579502
